rows.label: qst103401_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, just the faces I was hoping to see!

rows.label: qst103401_msg0002
rows.name:
A report has come in from one of our
men on an intelligence mission.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0003
rows.name:
Specifically, information regarding
those accursed anti-imperialists who
took the life of my wife.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0004
rows.name:
It seems they are an organized
anti-imperialist alliance, calling
themselves Brionac.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0005
rows.name:
And the members of Brionac will
soon be conducting a secret assembly.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0006
rows.name:
The place is Mine No. 2...
Right under the nose of the imperial
capital!

rows.label: qst103401_msg0007
rows.name:
Of course, the ideal plan would be to
bring this to the Senate and take
military action against Brionac.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0008
rows.name:
But if someone were to obstruct such
official action, just like with my wife...

rows.label: qst103401_msg0009
rows.name:
In the worst case scenario,
they might even target my son.
The mere thought of it terrifies me...

rows.label: qst103401_msg0010
rows.name:
I can't express how grateful I am
to hear that.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0011
rows.name:
If you will look into this for me,
I can concentrate on ensuring my
family's safety.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0012
rows.name: So, just to review the details...

rows.label: qst103401_msg0013
rows.name: I need you to go to Mine No. 2.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0014
rows.name:
There should only be a few key
members of Brionac present for
the assembly, but do be careful.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0101
rows.name:
I wish I could bring this Brionac
case to the Senate and take
official military action...

rows.label: qst103401_msg0102
rows.name:
But after what happened to my wife,
it's impossible to be too careful.

rows.label: qst103401_msg0103
rows.name:
You're the only ones I can trust
with this. I'm counting on you.
